sprawl
  • Reference

build_testraster

FUNCTION_DESCRIPTION

build_testraster(nrows = 100, ncols = 100, nbands = 1,
  with_nodata = TRUE, tofile = FALSE)

Arguments

nrows

numeric number of rows, Default: 100
ncols

numeric number of columns, Default: 100
nbands

numeric number of bands, Default: 1
with_nodata

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: TRUE
tofile

logical if TRUE, the rasterStack is saved to a temporary file and the name of the temporary filename is returned instead than the stack itself, Default: FALSE

Value

either the "test" rasterStack, or a filename corresponding to it (if tofile = TRUE)

Examples

# NOT RUN {
if(interactive()){
 r <- build_testraster(100,100,10, tofile = F)
 }
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
